snippet.title: Infinite Fleet - Counterattack Trailer
snippet.description:
Set in the year 2150, Counterattack presents the continuation of the story surrounding the massive Infinite Fleet universe. Commander Chase leads the first full Polaris fleet against an army of powerful Atrox ships. The reveal of a major gameplay mechanic awaits you in this trailer.

Watch Dearest Mila, the first Infinite Fleet trailer, here: https://youtu.be/ai6Wi5IV3-8

🚀 Stay up to date with Infinite Fleet's latest development: https://www.infinitefleet.com/newsletter

Or follow us on:

🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/infinitefleet
🌐 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/infinitefleet
📷 Instagram: https://instagram.com/infinitefleetgame
🙊 Discord: https://discord.gg/NVr3vhj
🤖 Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/InfiniteFleet/
💌 Telegram: https://t.me/infinitefleet

Infinite Fleet is an epic sci-fi anime-style strategy MMO on a galactic scale. Every choice you make in-game matters: your actions make a difference to the overall story arc of the game, and it will be up to you to fight for the future of humanity.

Learn more on https://www.infinitefleet.com.
